text: use both this parameter and |birth_date to display the person's date of birth, date of death, and age at death) --> | death_place = | other_names = | education = California State Polytechnic University, Pomona | alma_mater = | occupation = Journalist, television contributor | party = | spouse = | children = | family = | awards = | website = | signature = }} Sara A. Carter is an American journalist, television presenter and politician. She is known for being a former Fox News contributor. Carter was raised in Saudi Arabia. She studied journalism and communications at California State Polytechnic University, Pomona. In March 2025, President Donald Trump nominated Carter to be the next director of the Office of National Drug Control Policy (or "drug czar"). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Journalists from California Category:Fox News people Category:Politicians from California
title: Sara A. Carter
